Posted By: blindthrall (5/10/2011 1:52:44 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: The first part seems to be made to go with urabrask, at which point he turns into a 4/2 haster, aka a cheaper slash panther. The 0/-2 doesn't hurt at all though, it will even kill regenerators and indestructibles. That's pretty awesome for red really.

Posted By: mflanaga (6/4/2011 9:46:43 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@ Tommy9898: In block, I'd say either [Brutalizer Exarch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brutalizer Exarch) or [Entomber Exarch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Entomber Exarch) for the real tempo and card advantage they can generate. Even a field that didn't already have Primeval Titan or Skinrender, I'd play with them because I think they're well-designed. In a bigger format, I'd have to slam [Deceiver Exarch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deceiver Exarch); tapping and untapping permanents wins games, ask [Splinter Twin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Splinter Twin).  
  
Hey, [Corrupt Eunuchs](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Corrupt Eunuchs) is back. Everybody hide!
posts.html:
